Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> On 5/19/2017 at 7:50 AM, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> Squatters come and squat. They don't care, whose hill.
> 

Black-suited police men comes and takes them away.

Government hill.

I use the force to levatate the hill, and shake the black-suted police men off it. I force jump onto the hill and claim it.

My force-levatated hill
Laputa. Swift's levitating hill.

Gravity.

no levitating hill. I claim the landed hill for myself in the process.

I use the force to levatate the hill, add MOAR boosters and blast it into orbit of kerbin.

My space hill.

Kerbin falls on the hill.

Kerbin hill.

Kerbin collapses, causing worldwide destruction to both Kerbin and Earth.

epicenter hill.

Bar "Epicenter" is opened on top of the hill.

Bar owner's hill.

I forbid wordplay.

Boring hill.

I subvert your ban while underground.

Bored hill.

Wild pigs came to hill.

Boar hill.

I see pig. I see Bacon.

My yummy hill.

I throw the bacon off the hill as a distraction and claim the hill.

My hill

A pack of wolves smell the bacon and come to the hill.

You may keep thinking it's your hill.

Wolves eat previous owner of hill, then they go back to their den, full of bacon and scummy hill owner meat.

My hill, you may no longer keep thinking it's your hill

I don't think it's mine — because I think it's mine.

I mean, the wolves' den is an old mine under the hill.

The wolves leave in search of more food, and I claim the hill. 

My hill.

The wolves come back, find tasty meal, eat you, then go to sleep, and I cover up the mine

My hill

This was an old uranium mine.  

Wolves mutate, bite their way through the rock and...  

Mutant wolves' hill.

I invoke Non-Hollywood Mutation!

The wolves that don't die of radiation poisoning get stomach cancer. I adopt them, treat them as best I can, and train them into dogs.

My wolves.

Ten minutes later, my hill.

I'm a cat person. I get some cats to attack and fight wolves off. Did I mention tigers and lions are cats?

My hill

I think birds are cool, so I make a couple calls to get some to attack your cats. Did I mention that apparently aircraft are sometimes called "birds"? Send in the bombers and fighters!

My hill, defended by birds

Gas ends. Birds fall.

Parachute hill.

I bring in hydrogen fuel cell powered tanks to take the hill. 

My tank hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-05-27T22:42:52Z" title="05/27/2017 10:42  PM" data-short="7 yr">May 27, 2017</time> by 53miner53**

I stir your oxygen tanks.

My hill surrounded by dead tanks.
